name: Oooops! - Swipe and Dodge
description:
Make "Oops!" longer possible! Dodge "ps!" bullets and collect "o"!

Control the "Oo" to dodge the barrage of "ps"! The difficulty level goes up as you collect "o" to pass the level!

In "Level Challenge", a total of 20 types of barrage will attack you!

Go beyond the limits of "Oops" in "Endless Challenge"!

Instruction:

  • With mouse: 
            Drag the screen to move Oo and dodge the ps!, collecting o.
  • With touch screen:
           Swipe the screen to move Oo and dodge the ps!, collecting o.Features:

Features:

All play is free!

Endless play!

Easy & simple swipe controls!

Made with Golang and Ebitengine:

  • Ebitengine: https://ebiten.org/

          An open source game library for Golang
